name: Land
flavor: Those that practice the Land Discipline make the ground beneath their feat their weapon, creating earthen barricades and laying their enemies low with mighty tremors. Stances and Techniques in this Discipline manipulate the earth to create large Obstacles far more easily than any other type of spiritbound, Terrain that can slow and hinder foes that cannot be easily removed from the battlefield, and can unleash debilitating attacks that not only ignore cover, but also inflict conditions that limit enemy mobility and make them easier to strike. If you choose to utilize the Land Discipline, you will choose the shape of the battlefield, determining where enemies can move while providing allies an impenetrable defense. So long as they have solid ground beneath their feet, every battlefield is fortress for a master of the Land Discipline.

stances.name: Fortress Stance
stances.desc: A powerful stance that constructs an unassailable fortress of earth and stone.
stances.accumulate: At Refresh, gain 1 _Momentum_ for every adjacent Earthen Barricade beyond the first, to a maximum of 2.
stances.special: Whenever you are adjacent to an Earthen Barricade and are Attacked, you may Destroy the Earthen Barricade. Use the Deflect Reaction at no Cost and gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack.

stances.name: Roiling Stance
stances.desc: The ground around those that have mastered the Roiling Stance is nearly a liquid, quaking and shaking constantly.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ for every hostile creature beyond the first in your Burst at Refresh, up to a maximum of 3.
stances.effect: Create a Burst 2 centered on you that moves with you. Creatures treat the spaces in this Burst around you as _Rough_.
stances.special: Whenever you inflict _Exposed_ or _Hobbled_ on a creature within the Burst created by this effect you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to instead inflict _Prone_, using the original Cost to Negate.

stances.name: Sculptor Stance
stances.desc: A well-practiced Earthbonded can shape earth and stone as easily as clay, sculpting the field around them to their liking.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ for every Action you take that creates earthen _Rough Terrain_ or _Dangerous Terrain_.
stances.effect: At Refresh, you may change 2 _Rough or _Jagged_ spaces made of earthen materials into your choice of Normal, _Rough_, or _Jagged_. These spaces are chosen independently, and can be changed into different types.
stances.special: You may ignore _Rough_ and _Jagged_ Terrain made of earthen materials while in this Stance.

techniques.name: Collapse
techniques.desc: A powerful technique that creates a cave below the ground, then collapses the ground downwards, sending enemies into a painful fall.
techniques.effect: All spaces in the area become _Rough_ and a _Hazard_. At the end of the Round, resolve the below Attack in the same Area.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area becomes a Blast 3.

techniques.name: Jagged Earth
techniques.desc: Blades of the earth appear out of nowhere, suddenly striking a foe.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. Immediately after resolving the attack make a space adjacent to the target _Jagged_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. This attack becomes _Accurate_ and you may instead create an _Earthen Barricade_.

techniques.name: Earth Tomb
techniques.desc: By using nearby earth and stone the Earthbonded seals their foe away.
techniques.target: A Size 1 creature adjacent to at least two _Earthen Feature_s.
techniques.effect: Attack the target with the below Profile, destroying the _Earthen Feature_s. On a _Hit_ or _Crit_,  _Entomb_ the creature in an Earthen Barricade. A creature may end _Entomb_ by spending 4 _Grit_ on their turn. If a creature spends _Reflex_ to Negate, they must immediately Move 1 and fall _Prone_. An Earthen Barricade is then created in their original space. If they cannot Move, they may not spend _Reflex_ in this way.
techniques.special: If there are four adjacent _Earthen Features_: Either this Attack is _Accurate_, or you may target a Size 2 creature. Destroy all _Earthen Feature_s used for this Attack.
techniques.boost: 1 _Grit_, 2 _Momentum_: Add _Groundsource_. You may resolve the normal Effect without any _Earthen Feature_s.

techniques.name: Quake
techniques.desc: A minor earthquake, firing earth upward and testing the footing of all involved.
techniques.effect: Attack all targets in the area with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 2 Momentum. Area becomes Burst 2.

techniques.name: Spikes
techniques.desc: Hardened spikes rise up from the earth, leaving a jagged wake that is difficult to traverse.
techniques.effect: The area immediately becomes _Rough_ and _Jagged_. Any character in the area must spend 1 _Reflex_ or gain _Hobbled_ 1x2.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Place another Line 4 connected to the initial area.

techniques.name: Tremors
techniques.desc: The earthbound shakes the earth around them, making a sure footing impossible.
techniques.effect: Attack all targets in the area using the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area becomes Burst 2.

techniques.name: Quicksand
techniques.desc: Liquified earth threatens to swallow the unaware whole.
techniques.effect: The target Area becomes _Rough_. If a Size 1 creature moves into a space with Quicksand they must spend 1 _Reflex_. If a creature spends _Reflex_, they may move through Quicksand for the rest of the turn without penalty. If they do not spend _Reflex_, they sink into the Quicksand and are _Restrained_ until they _Sacrifice_ an Action and spend 2 _Grit_ or _Reflex_ to escape. An adjacent creature can also Sacrifice an Action to free a creature from _Restrained_ without any Cost. A creature _Restrained_ by Quicksand takes 3 True Damage at the end of the Round. A single space of Quicksand may only have one creature _Restrained_ at a time.
techniques.special: A character may only have three instances of Quickand at a time, regardless of their size.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. You instead create the Quicksand in a Blast 1 area. Quicksand now triggers off Size 2 creatures as well.

techniques.name: Earth Kinesis
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded moves the earth of the battlefield around, choosing the shape as easily as breathing.
techniques.effect:
Draw up to a Line 5 from a Target within Range and move it to the end of the Line. Any creatures in the Line are moved to the end of the Line unless they spend 1 _Reflex_ or 2 _Grit_.
• If they spend _Reflex_, they may Move 1 out of the Line. If they cannot Move out of the Line, they cannot spend _Reflex_ in this way.
• If they spend _Grit_, they are not moved and the Feature is instead placed adjacent to them.
If a creature Immune to being moved is in the Line, instead place the _Earthen Feature_ adjacent to them.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Target is: A Size 2 Earthen Feature or three Size 1 Earthen Features. If you move a Size 2 Earthen Feature, it instead costs 3 _Grit_ to not be moved. Any creatures moved take 3 Damage.

techniques.name: Earthen Bulwark
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded creates a mighty wall, fortifying their position.
techniques.effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Create an Earthen Barricade in all spaces within the area. Any creatures in these spaces are immediately moved to an adjacent space of their choice. Creatures of your choice moved by this ability gain _Exposed_ 1 or _Impair_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).

techniques.name: Earthen Shield
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded throws up a barricade, only using it when the right moment strikes.
techniques.trigger: You or a creature within range is Attacked.
techniques.effect: Create an _Earthen Barricade_ adjacent to the triggering creature. Reduce the Attack Roll by 1, and grant the triggering creature 1 Armor against the triggering Attack.

techniques.name: Earth Slide
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded slides the ground beneath their feet forward, potentially leaving a wake of destruction behind.
techniques.effect: You may make the space you begin your Move in _Rough_.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. Make spaces additional spaces you move through _Rough_, at a rate of 1 _Momentum_ per 3 spaces.

techniques.name: Burrow
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded moves through the earth like a mole, safely reaching their destination.
techniques.effect: This Movement ignores all Terrain and Obstacles.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, Speed is 4 and Movement is Sprint.

name: Boulder
flavor: The Boulder Discipline focuses on powerful strikes with great stones, creating an avalanche of heavy, driving strikes. The creation and use of Boulders is central to this Discipline, where they can largely be used to provide temporary armor to the user, empower mighty strikes, and manipulate the position of foes. This Discipline requires a greater degree of positioning and resource management than most but, if used well, can enable powerful combos.

stances.name: Colossus Stance
stances.desc: The Colossus specializes in heavy armor made of stone, limiting mobility but providing unparalleled defense.
stances.effect: At Refresh, you may choose to gain _Hobbled_ 1x3. If you do, while you have any _Stone Armor_ for the remainder of the Round, gain Resistance to all damage originating from 4 or more spaces away.
stances.special: If you have an Earth Enchant active at Refresh, instead gain 3 _Stone Armor_.

stances.name: Rubble Stance
stances.desc: The Rubble Stance creates stones only to destroy them, using the rubble for enhanced mobility.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you Destroy a Boulder.
stances.effect: Every time you Destroy a Boulder, you may immediately Move 1 in any direction. Every time you Destroy a Boulder, you may deal 2 Damage to all adjacent creatures, excluding yourself.

stances.name: Siege Stance
stances.desc: Flinging boulders is a combat staple of Earthbonded, but some are true masters of it, flinging boulders in precise arcs as soon as they are formed.
stances.accumulate: Every time you take an Action that moves or creates a Boulder, gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Once per round in the Plotting phase, you may change the speed of an Action that creates a Boulder to Set-Up and Attach it to an action that Targets a Boulder.
stances.special: When you take the Stone Strike or Boulder Throw Action, instead of resolving it at its normal Speed, you may place a Hazard within Range 8. Stone Strike places a Cone 2 Hazard, while Boulder Throw places a Blast X, where X is the Size of the Boulder. At the end of the next Phase, resolve the Attack with Advantage in all Hazard spaces and, if using Boulder Throw, place it the Boulder used for the Action in the center of the Blast.

techniques.name: Chip Damage
techniques.trigger: You take Damage while having any _Stone Armor_ created by an Earth Technique or Stance.
techniques.desc: You manipulate the shards of your shattered armor, striking back against your enemies.
techniques.effect: Attack all targets in the area with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: X _Stone Armor_. For each _Stone Armor_ spent, deal 2 additional damage on a _Hit_ or Crit.

techniques.name: Rockslide
techniques.trigger: A creature enters a space adjacent to a Boulder within Range.
techniques.desc: A sudden shift of a boulder, throwing an enemy off-course.
techniques.effect: Attack the triggering target with the below Profile. If you _Push_ the target, move the Boulder so it is still adjacent to the target.
techniques.special: If this _Push_ moves the target adjacent to a new Boulder, you may pay the Cost again to repeat the Attack. A Boulder may only be used to attack once per turn.

techniques.name: Earthfall
techniques.desc: A quick coat of stone covers the weapon, amplifying the weight of the strike and leaving rubble near the target.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If you _Hit_ or _Crit_,  you may add _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) to the attack. Regardless, create a Boulder in a space Adjacent to the Target.

techniques.name: Stone Strike
techniques.desc: You fling a fist-sized stone at great speed, knocking enemies off-balance.
techniques.boost: 3 _Momentum_. Halve the Damage, but you may repeat this Strike immediately after using it.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.

techniques.name: Boulder Throw
techniques.desc: A boulder is launched in a straight line, bludgeoning all in its path.
techniques.effect: Draw a Line 6 from the Target, Attacking with the below Profile against all targets in the area. Move the Boulder to the end of this Line after attacking.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_ for each Size about 1 the Target is.
techniques.special: For each Size above 1 the target Boulder is, this Attack deals +1 damage on a _Graze_,  _Hit_,  or Crit.

techniques.name: Avalanche
techniques.desc: The Earthbound seizes control of all nearby boulders, flinging them in a great wave.
techniques.effect: Move all Targets 1 space in the same direction. If this would move the Target into an occupied space, Attack with the below profile. If this attack Pushes and the Target has remaining spaces to move, continue moving the Target.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. For every Momentum spent, move all Targets 1 additional space, deal 1 additional damage, and increase this Attack's Push by 1.

techniques.name: Fracture
techniques.desc: A boulder within range detonates, sending a blast of stone shrapnel shredding through nearby enemies.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile in a Burst 1 around the Target, then Destroy the Target.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. You may choose a Size 2 Boulder. Instead of Destroying the Boulder, replace it with 4 Size 1 Boulders, then move each Boulder one space diagonally away from the previous Boulder's center. Increase the Cost to Negate by 1.

techniques.name: Stone Gauntlet
techniques.desc: A fist of cobblestones forms around your hand, making unarmed strikes hit like an avalanche.
techniques.effect: Equip the Stone Gauntlet Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Stone Gauntlets Equipped.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Stone Gauntlet in each.

techniques.name: Stone Shield
techniques.target: Unoccupied adjacent spaces made of earth or stone within Range, or two adjacent Size 1 Earthen Feature.
techniques.desc: A slab of stone becomes a barrier, defending against ranged attacks.
techniques.effect: Create a Line 2 Boulder in unoccupied spaces within Range. At the start of each of your Turns, you may Move the Stone Shield up to 3 spaces, and turn it up to one space. The Stone Shield can move through occupied spaces, but may not end its movement there.
techniques.special: You may end this Enchant at the end of any of your turns and immediately fire the Stone Shield forward. Immediately use the Boulder Throw Technique with the Stone Shield, ignoring the typical Range of the ability.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead create a Line 3 Boulder.

techniques.name: Create Boulder
techniques.desc: Dirt and stone are formed into a mighty boulder, ready to be fired.
techniques.target: An unoccupied space made of earth or stone within range, or a Size 1 _Earthen Feature_.
techniques.effect: Create a Size 1 Boulder in the target space, or replace the _Earthen Feature_ with a Boulder.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead create a Size 2 Boulder, or create two additional Size 1 Boulders. This only costs 1 _Momentum_ if all Boulders created are replacing _Earthen Feature_s.

techniques.name: Stonescreen
techniques.desc: With a powerful strike a boulder is shattered, staggering and pushing all nearby.
techniques.effect: Destroy the Target. Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target using the below Profile. The area is _Veiled_ for two _Phases_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. The Range is instead 5.

techniques.name: Avalanche Charge
techniques.desc: You charge forward, amplifying your speed by smashing through stones.
techniques.effect: During the Movement granted by this effect you can Move through Boulders, destroying them in the process. Gain 1 _Stone Armor_ for every Boulder destroyed in this way. If you Attach this to an Attack, deal +1 damage on a _Hit_ or _Crit_ for each Boulder destroyed in this way.
techniques.special: All Movement granted by this Technique must be in a straight line, and must pass through at least one Boulder.

name: Grounding
flavor: The Grounding Discipline focuses on drawing energy from the earth itself to become immensely strong and immovable. Characters that specialize in the Grounding Discipline will generate an immense amount of Grit, as well as mitigate their need to spend it through aspects of their Stances and Reactions. While slow and low in mobility, the Grounding Stance allows for some of the highest damage Weapon Attacks in the system, and can easily generate massive Push against foes.

stances.name: Anchor Stance
stances.desc: By pulling oneself down into the earth, earth spirits can magnify their perceived weight many times over and become an unmovable bastion.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you do not Move on your _Turn_ when you have Movement, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Reduce the Cost to negate all _Push_, _Pull_ and _Slide_ effects by 2. Reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ all other effects by 1.
stances.special: While in this Stance you may wield Titanic Weapons.

stances.name: Mighty Stance
stances.desc: By drawing upon the earth the earthbound's strength becomes inhuman and a mighty driving force.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Push_ a creature with an Attack, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Increase your Damage with all Weapon Attacks by 2. Whenever you make a Weapon Attack you may spend up to 3 _Grit_, adding twice that value in _Push_. The cost to _Negate_ is _Grit_ equal to the _Grit_ spent. Whenever you _Push_ a creature into an Obstacle with a Weapon Attack they gain _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Focus_).
stances.special: While in this Stance you may wield Titanic Weapons.

stances.name: Ox Stance
stances.desc: A difficult Stance to master, the Ox Stance is the pinnacle of physical strength, at the cost of an earthbound's mobility.
stances.effect: Reduce the Cost to negate all _Push_, _Pull_ and _Slide_ effects by 1. Increase your Damage with all Weapon Attacks by 1. Whenever you make a Weapon Attack you may create _Rough Terrain_ adjacent to the Target.
stances.special: While in this Stance you may wield Titanic Weapons.

techniques.name: Mighty Fling
techniques.desc: Using their monstrous strength, the earthbound flings an object with horrific force.
techniques.reqs: Weapon Equipped or adjacent Improvised Weapon
techniques.effect:
Make an Attack with the appropriate _Profile_ as follows:
 * If using an Improvised Weapon, resolve it with the appropriate Profile.
 * If using a Weapon with the _Thrown_ property, use its Profile.
 * If using a _Light_ Weapon, resolve it with the Small Improvised Weapon _Profile_.
 * If using a _Versatile_ Weapon, resolve it with the Medium Improvised Weapon _Profile_.
 * If using a _Heavy_ Weapon, resolve it with the Large Improvised Weapon _Profile_.

If the Weapon already has the _Thrown_ tag, increase it's value by 4. Otherwise, add _Thrown_ 3.

techniques.name: Mighty Strike
techniques.desc: A slow, powerful blow that promises to leave a heavy impact.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, dealing +2 damage bonus with a _Versatile_ Weapon or +3 with a _Heavy_ Weapon. Add _Push_ 2 (1 _Grit_) to the Attack.

techniques.name: Concussive Slam
techniques.desc: A mighty blow that crashes into the ground, creating a shockwave around the initial attack.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Immediately after the Attack, repeat it in a Burst 1 around the original Target. You may exempt yourself from this attack. Create _Rough Terrain_ in the area around the attack.

techniques.name: Gaia Strike
techniques.desc: A blow using every ounce of strength within the earth itself.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, dealing +3 damage bonus with a _Versatile_ Weapon or +5 with a _Heavy_ Weapon. After determining the total Damage, double it. Add _Push_ 8, _Prone_, (2 _Grit_) to the Attack.
techniques.boost: 4 _Momentum_: Instead, triple the total Damage.

techniques.name: Gather Strength
techniques.desc: You focus your strength, drawing power from the earth itself to push your body beyond its limits.
techniques.effect: Gain 3 _Grit_ and 1 _Momentum_.
techniques.special: If you are in a Grounding Stance gain 1 additional _Grit_ and _Momentum_.

techniques.name: Colossal Strength
techniques.desc: You attack with your colossal strength, smashing stones and sending foes flying.
techniques.effect: If you attack a Creature, attack with the below _Profile_. If you attack an _Obstacle_, instead deal 10 Damage.
techniques.special: If you _Push_ a creature into an Obstacle double the Damage. Deal the same amount of Damage + 2 to the Obstacle.
techniques.boost: 1 _Grit_: If you Damage an Obstacle, increase the Damage dealt to it by 5. You may repeat this Boost.

techniques.name: Mighty Throw Creature
techniques.desc: Drawing upon the earth, you fling a grappled creature a frightening distance.
techniques.effect: End the _Grapple_. _Push_ 6 (4 _Grit_) the _Grappled_ creature, then inflict _Prone_ (3 _Reflex_) and deal 5 Damage. If the creature _Negates_ they take half Damage. If you _Push_ the creature into an Obstacle or Creature, deal an additional 3 Damage to the original Target and increase the Cost to _Negate_ by 1. The Creature or Obstacle they collide with takes 7 Damage and gains _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_).
techniques.special: When you gain this Technique, also gain the Throw Creature Technique.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_: Instead, _Push_ 8. If you are in a Grounding Stance, this _Boost_ costs 0 _Momentum_.
1 _Focus_: You may instead use this on an adjacent willing creature that you are not _Grappling_. The cost to _Negate_ for this creature is only 1 _Reflex_.

techniques.name: Bull Rush
techniques.desc: You charge forward with unstoppable force, crashing through all in your path.
techniques.effect: The Movement granted by this Technique must be taken in a straight line. Any Creature you move through takes 3 damage is is knocked _Prone_ (2 _Grit_ or _Reflex_). If they _Negate_ they take half Damage. You may attempt to crash through Obstacles with this Movement; make a Strong Strike using a Body Weapon against any Obstacle in your path and add the _Siege_ Keyword. Whenever you make this Attack, you may spend 1 _Grit_ to increase the Damage by 4 if you fail to destroy the Obstacle.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Immediately repeat this Technique.

techniques.name: Mighty Leap
techniques.desc: You gather the earth's strength in your legs before launching yourself through the air.
techniques.effect: The Movement granted by this Technique must be taken in a straight line. At the start and end of this _Movement_, make the Area _Veiled_ and _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) all creatures in it.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, Movement is Sprint.

techniques.name: Break Free
techniques.desc: You use your colossal strength to break free from any restraints.
techniques.effect: You may immediately attempt to end the effect, paying _Grit_ instead of the typical cost and treating yourself as having spent 2 additional _Grit_. If you end the Status gain 1 _Momentum_.
techniques.boost: 0 _Grit_: You may instead use this Reaction if you start your turn adjacent to an Enemy. If you do, instead inflict _Push_ 2 or _Prone_ (1 _Grit_).

techniques.name: Mountain Crash
techniques.desc: You become as solid as a mountain against a foe's strike.
techniques.effect: Reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 2 and inflict _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Focus_). You may spend _Grit_ in place of _Reflex_ to _Negate_ this Attack. Gain _Hobbled_ 1.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may use the Basic Strike Technique, treating its Move as none. You must use a _Body_ Weapon.

techniques.name: Solid Footing
techniques.desc: You set your feet in the ground when somebody attempts to move you, magnifying your weight a hundred times over.
techniques.effect: Reduce the cost to _Negate_ the triggering Effect by 2. If you fully _Negate_ the effect, gain 1 _Momentum_.
techniques.special: You may choose to gain _Hobbled_ 1 as a part of this Reaction. If you do, reduce the cost to _Negate_ the triggering effect by an additional 2.

name: Stoneheart
flavor: The Stoneheart Discipline channels the essence of the earth to make one's heart like stone and impenetrable to fear. Stoneheart's mechanics revolve around Courage and their ability to grant it to themselves an allies. Typically, this courage is gained in response to a small victory on the battlefield, a reckless act, or bolstering the courage of one who is about to fall. Stoneheart's belong on the front lines of a battlefield and make it far easier for allies to reach their foes, granting them Momentum and other benefits all the while.

stances.name: Bold Stance
stances.desc: You channel the spirits of earth and stone, filling you with a dangerous, reckless bravery.
stances.effect: Every round at Refresh, you may issue a brave challenge. Choose up to 3 hostile creatures within Range 6. These targets all gain _Courage_ 1x3 (1 _Focus_). While they have this _Courage_ the enemies only clear it by ending their turn adjacent to you but also have _Advantage_ on all Attacks targeting you. Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time one of these targets clears a _Courage_.
stances.special: While in this Stance reduce the Cost to _Negate_ or remove _Fear_ by 2.

stances.name: Inspiring Stance
stances.desc: You are a font of courage, rallying your allies with every move you make.
stances.effect: At the start of each of your _Turns_ you may grant an ally with Range 6 _Courage_ 1. Whenever an ally within this Range makes an Attack, you may remove their topmost _Courage_ Token and grant them a Bonus to their _Attack Roll_ equal to the Token's Value.
stances.special: While in this Stance reduce the Cost to _Negate_ or remove _Fear_ by 2.

stances.name: Defiant Stance
stances.desc: No matter the punishment you take, your courage will carry you through the battle.
stances.accumulate: The first time each _Phase_ you take Damage gain _Courage_ 1. If you have no Endurance, gain _Courage_ 2 instead.
stances.effect: At the end of any of your turns you may remove the topmost _Courage_ Token and either gain _Grit_ equal to its value or _Vigor_ equal to twice its value.
stances.special: While in this Stance reduce the Cost to _Negate_ or remove _Fear_ by 2.

techniques.name: Bold Strike
techniques.desc: A bold strike that inspires allies but leaves you open.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Gain _Exposed_ 1. On a _Hit_ grant a creature within Range 6 _Courage_ 1, _Vigor_ 3. On a _Crit_, grant two allies _Courage_ 1, _Vigor_ 3 or one ally _Courage_ 2, _Vigor_ 6.

techniques.name: Reckless Abandon
techniques.desc: You fill a foe with false courage, causing them to leave themselves open to a disastrous strike.
techniques.effect: Choose a creature within range. That creature gains _Courage_ 2, _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Focus_).
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. Unless the Target Negates, that creature must immediately _Reposition_, using all Movement to move directly towards an enemy by the shortest possible route.

techniques.name: Valorous Warcry
techniques.desc: As you defeat a foe you let out a victorious cry, lifting the spirits of your allies.
techniques.effect: All allies in the Area gain _Courage_ 1.
techniques.special: When you gain this Technique, also gain the Warcry Technique.
techniques.boost:
2 _Momentum_: Instead, all allies gain _Courage_ 2.
1 _Focus_: Area is instead Burst 6.

techniques.name: Inspiring Cry
techniques.desc: You fill an ally in a dire spot with courage to keep them in the battle.
techniques.trigger: Any ally in range takes Damage or would gain _Fear_.
techniques.effect: Grant the ally _Courage_ 1 and _Vigor_ 2.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, grant _Courage_ 2 or _Courage_ 1x2.

techniques.name: Chant of Bravery
techniques.desc: You rouse the hearts of those near you, allowing them to push far beyond their mortal limits.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Focus_ initially, 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh every Round this Enchant persists.
techniques.effect: While this _Enchant_ persists, any ally that ends their _Turn_ within Range of you gains 3 _Vigor_ or _Courage_ 1.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Range is instead 3.

techniques.name: Hearts of Stone
techniques.desc: You cause your allies' courage to flare, allowing them to push forward past debilitating conditions.
techniques.effect: As long as this _Enchant_ persists whenever an ally within Range of you would gain _Impaired_, _Dazed_, _Hobbled_ or _Suppressed_ they may clear any Value of _Courage_ and reduce the cost to _Negate_ by the total Value cleared. Alternatively, if an ally would begin their turn _Injured_ they may clear 2 _Courage_ to act as if they were not _Injured_ for that _Turn_. This _Enchant_ ends if there are ever no enemies within Range of you.
techniques.special: You or an ally may pay 1 _Focus_ at the end of their turn. They may clear any value of _Courage_, then count that as any Token when clearing _Impaired_, _Dazed_, _Hobbled_ or _Suppressed_.

techniques.name: Inspire Courage
techniques.desc: You fill an ally's heart with courage.
techniques.effect: Choose a creature within range. That creature gains _Courage_ 3 or _Courage_ 1x3.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: After granting the Target _Courage_ you may redistribute their _Courage_ Tokens in whatever way you wish, so long as the total value remains the same. For example, three _Courage_ 1 Tokens may be made a single _Courage_ 3 Token.

techniques.name: Valiant Charge
techniques.desc: You fill an ally with reckless bravery, allowing them to charge headlong into the fray.
techniques.effect: Choose a creature within range. That creature may immediately Reposition as a Reaction, but must move directly towards an enemy by the shortest possible route.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_ or _Focus_: The target gains 2 _Guard_ while using the Movement granted by this.
1 _Momentum_, 1 _Reflex_ (paid by the Target): Movement is instead Shift.

techniques.name: Valorous Rally
techniques.desc: You let out a rallying cry, filling your allies' hearts with courage and the drive to fight.
techniques.effect: All allies in the Area gain _Courage_ 2, _Vigor_ 6 and may immediately may immediately Reposition as a Reaction, but must move directly towards an enemy by the shortest possible route. If they end this Movement next to a hostile creature they may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make a single 1 AP Attack against that Creature as a part of the same Reaction without paying a _Blitz_ cost but paying all other Costs as normal.
techniques.special: When you gain this Technique, also gain the Rally Technique.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_ or _Focus_: All allies gain 2 _Guard_ for this Movement.

techniques.name: Courageous Charge
techniques.desc: You dash forward recklessly, inspiring your allies with your display.
techniques.effect: Enemies have _Advantage_ on all Attacks made against you during this Movement, but gain _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Focus_) if they do not take a _Punish_ Reaction when they are able to. Whenever an enemy makes a _Punish_ Attack against you either gain _Courage_ 1 or grant an ally within Range _Courage_ 1.
techniques.boost: 2 _Grit_: Gain _Guard_ 2 for this Movement.

techniques.name: Courageous Shield
techniques.desc: You become a shining example of courage, leaping in front of an attack that would lay an ally low.
techniques.trigger: An ally within Range would reach 0 _Endurance_ or _Health_ due to an Attack.
techniques.effect: Move into the target's space, _Pushing_ them 1. You become the Target of the original Attack. If this was an Area attack your ally is only exempt if they are _Pushed_ out of the Area. The ally gains _Courage_ 1.
techniques.boost:
1 _Reflex_: Range is instead Shift Movement.
1 _Focus_: The ally instead gains _Courage_ 2.
1 _Grit_: You may _Push_ you ally an additional 1.
techniques.special: You may pay any amount of the Cost by expending an equivalent Value of _Courage_, using any Tokens.

techniques.name: Last Stand
techniques.desc: You fill a falling friend with courage, keeping them on their feet when they should fall.
techniques.trigger: You or an ally with _Courage_ within Range would reach 0 _Endurance_ but not 0 _Health_.
techniques.effect: While this _Enchant_ persists the triggering Creature takes no penalties from having no _Endurance_. Instead, they reduce the _Cost_ of all Techniques by 1, have _Advantage_ on all Attacks, and gain _Guard_ 2. This Enchant ends if the Target gains Endurance or does not remove a _Courage_ Token at the end of their _Turn_.
techniques.special: The _Courage_ must be paid by the triggering Creature by removing that Value of _Courage_, using any Tokens.

name: Tremorsight
flavor: The Tremorsight Discipline allows an Earthbonded to read the vibrations of the earth, providing perfect knowledge of everything touching the ground. The Range of these techniques depends on how far their Seismic Sense is extending, which can be amplified by remaining still. Outside this radius the Earthbound has no special powers but against foes in this area they can generate a great deal of Knowledge, making it far easier to attack and defend against all these creatures. A skilled practitioner of this Discipline can even extend their senses into creatures, learning their weaknesses and leaving them open to devastating attacks.

stances.name: Flawfinder Stance
stances.desc: Your senses analyze every aspect of your foes' defenses, allowing you to easily break and bypass them with every strike.
stances.effect: At the start of your Turn, you may spend _Knowledge_ on a creature in your Seismic Sense to learn their weak points, leaving them open to attack. Pay up to 3 _Knowledge_; the creature must immediately spend equivalent _Focus_ or _Momentum_ (in any combination) or lose that many _Defensive Tokens_ of your choice. In addition, treat all _Obstacles_ within your Seismic Sense as _Fragile_ when you attack them.
stances.special: While in this Stance you have Seismic Sense within 6 spaces, which allows you to ignore _Veiled_ Terrain.

stances.name: Pulsereader Stance
stances.desc: You feel the subtle vibrations of the earth, feeling the true intentions of your foes and better preparing you for future assaults.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ any time a creature _Misses_ or _Grazes_ you with an _Attack_.
stances.effect: While in this Stance reduce the cost to _Negate_ all _Feint_ Techniques by 2. Add _Sure Hit_ 1 to Attacks against Targets in your Seismic Sense.
stances.special: While in this Stance you have Seismic Sense within 2 spaces, which allows you to ignore _Veiled_ Terrain.

stances.name: Sonar Stance
stances.desc: Your senses extend out around you, providing you perfect knowledge of all foes.
stances.effect: The first time each _Phase_ a hostile creature ends their _Turn_ within your Seismic Sense inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on them.
stances.special: While in this Stance you have Seismic Sense within 4 spaces, which allows you to ignore _Veiled_ Terrain.

techniques.name: Perfect Read
techniques.desc: You use your perfect analysis of a foes' weak points and defenses to unleash a truly devastating attack.
techniques.reqs: Must be Attached to a Strike.
techniques.effect: If the Target of the Attached Strike is within your Seismic Sense, add _Unblockable_ 1, _Sure Hit_ 1, and _Pierce_ 1. On a _Hit_ or _Crit_ you may add _Break_ (2 _Focus_) to the Attack.
techniques.special: As a part of this Attack, you may spend any amount of _Knowledge_ you have on the creature. If you do not _Miss_, add that value to the Damage dealt.

techniques.name: Exploiting Strike
techniques.desc: You find an old wound in an enemy with your seismic sense before bringing your weapon crashing down on it.
techniques.reqs: Target must be within your Seismic Sense + 2 and on earthen ground.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_ or _Graze_, add _Hobbled_ 1, _Dazed_ 2, or _Impaired_ 2 (2 _Focus_) to the Attack. On a _Crit_, add two and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

techniques.name: Locating Wave
techniques.desc: As a foe falls their body sends out a shockwave, carrying even more information to you.
techniques.trigger: A creature is Defeated or becomes _Prone_ in Range.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Reveal_, _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on all creatures within the Area, centered on the Triggering Target.

techniques.name: Hidden Flaw
techniques.desc: As a foe slams into an obstacle you glean more knowledge, and ensure they strike the most painful point.
techniques.trigger: A creature within Range is forcibly moved into an _Obstacle_.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Knowledge_ 2 (1 _Focus_). Additionally, the creature takes 2 Damage and gains _Dazed_ 2 or _Wounded_ 1 (Any 2 _Focus_ or _Grit_).

techniques.name: Seismic Aim
techniques.desc: You steady your footing, pushing your senses even further through the earth.
techniques.trigger: You make an Attack against a creature within Range.
techniques.effect: This _Attack_ cannot have _Disadvantage_ and ignores _Cover_. Increase your _Attack Roll_ by 1 and, on a _Crit_, inflict _Dazed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Make this Attack at _Advantage_.

techniques.name: Broaden Senses
techniques.desc: You steady your footing, pushing your senses even further through the earth.
techniques.effect: Expand your Seismic Sense by 4 until the next time you Move. Gain 1 _Focus_. Inflict a total of 2 _Knowledge_ on any combination of creatures within your Seismic Sense, with a _Focus_ cost to _Negate_ equal to the _Knowledge_ inflicted. Inflict _Reveal_ on the same creatures.

techniques.name: Tissue Scan
techniques.desc: You focus your senses on a foe and quickly appraise an accurate state of their vitality.
techniques.effect: The Target must spend 2 _Focus_. If they do not, inflict _Reveal_, 4 _Knowledge_ and learn how many of each _Defensive Token_ they have.

techniques.name: Break Footing
techniques.desc: You analyze a foe's footing before subtly shifting the earth, knocking a foe off-balance.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below _Profile_.

techniques.name: Remote Viewing
techniques.desc: You focus your tremorsense outward, gaining insight into a distant area.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_) on all creatures within the Area. In addition, create an Area of Seismic Sense within Range that continues as long as this Enchant exists.
techniques.boost: 2 _Focus_: Remove the Enchant Keyword. The Area persists until the end of the Encounter.

techniques.name: Reveal Flaw
techniques.desc: As you gather information you find flaws in a foe's defenses, something you quickly relay to an ally.
techniques.trigger: You or an ally attacks a creature you have at least 2 _Knowledge_ on.
techniques.effect: Add either _Unblockable_ 2 or _Sure Hit_ 2 to the Attack.
techniques.special: You may also trigger this whenever an ally attacks an Obstacle in your Seismic Sense; add _Siege_ to their Attack.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add both Effects to the Attack.

techniques.name: True Heart Scan
techniques.desc: You focus your senses on a foe, reverberating vibrations through them to learn every aspect of their defenses.
techniques.effect: The Target must immediately spend 5 _Focus_. If they do not, inflict 8 _Knowledge_ on them and, until the end of the _Round_, whenever you or an ally makes an Attack against that creature you may spend 1 _Knowledge_ to increase the _Attack Roll_. You may spend up to 3 _Knowledge_ per Attack, for a total bonus of +3. In addition, when that creature attempts to take an _Evade_ or _Block_ Reaction you may spend _Knowledge_ equal to the _Cost_ of the _Reaction_ to cancel their _Reaction_.

techniques.name: Sense Attack
techniques.desc: You sense an attack incoming, making a block or evade trivial for you.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked by a creature within Range.
techniques.special: This Reaction does not use your Reaction for the _Turn_, but may only be used once per _Phase_.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Knowledge_ 1 (1 _Focus_) and reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1.
